description.value:
When you choose this bullet you may choose one of the other bullets for free, the free bullet will provide a spell option for your Thaumaturge charges to be used on. You may cast this spell without expending a spell slot but instead expending a charge of your Thaumaturge. You cannot have more Thaumaturge charges than your level. You may also cast any of these acquired spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spellcasting ability for any of these spells is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. You may select this bullet more than once, and each selection provides a Thaumaturge charge.

If you select this feat multiple times, it is recommended to not add it to your sheet multiple times but instead to update this feat with an additional charge each time and update the feat name to reflect the number of selections.
